VIDEO SYSTEMS Text Inserter Suggested Retail: $799.00 Our Price: $599.00 View Details
Sure looks like they scanned that item.
Features View items as they are scanned Select Color Of Specific Items Position Text on Screen to Fit Specific Needs

Memory Expansion Module, 4MB Suggested Retail: N/A Our Price: $40.00
Samsung Second Cash Drawer Kit Suggested Retail: N/A Our Price: $135.00 View Details Model 53 Drawer w/Cable. Adds second cash drawer to most Samsung model cash registers.
Datacap LT Suggested Retail: $600.00 Our Price: $495.00 View Details
Datacap Credit Card Authorization System
Features Integrate Credit Card Authorization Automatic Close Batch Eliminates The Need For Additional Credit Card Hardware Uses Printer in Cash Register for Credit Card Slips (Wireless Option Available)
Coin Dispenser Suggested Retail: $1,475.00 Our Price: $1,100.00 View Details
Automatic Coin Dispenser
Features Sleek Design and Small Footprint Removable coin canister has substantial capacity. RS 232 Interface Built to withstand the punishment of continuous high volume operations.
SCANNERS Metrologic MS9540 Voyager Scanner Suggested Retail: $399.00 Our Price: $200.00 View Details
VoyagerCG is an advanced auto-trigger, single line laser bar code scanner that is equally effective hand held or in the stand for presentation scanning.
Features Automatic trigger PowerLink, user-replaceable cables Adjustable stand Firmware updates via Flash ROM Custom edit the bar code data Short-range and long-range activation RSS-14 decoding capability Features CodeGate Technology
Download/View Brochure White Keyboard Wedge White Serial White USB Black Keyboard Wedge Black Serial Black USB
Symbol LS 2208 Barcode Scanner Suggested Retail: $475.00 Our Price: $220.00 View Details
Investment Protection and Maximum Productivity at an Affordable Price
Features Durable Scan Element Design Working Range is Contact to 17" Multiple Interfaces On-Board Aggressive on Poorly Printed or Long Barcodes Hands Free Stand Ergonomic Design Easy programming using the 123Scan Setup Utility
Download/View Brochure White Keyboard Wedge White Serial Black Keyboard Wedge Black Serial
Symbol LS 9208 Omnidirectional Projection Scanner Suggested Retail: $740.00 Our Price: $395.00 View Details
Speed and Versatility Combine for Increased Productivity at Checkout
Features Small Footprint Built-In Shock Absorption Innovative 100-Line Rastering Omnidirectional Scan Pattern or Single Line Mode Supports 123Scan for Easy Programming Multiple Onboard Interfaces Universal Cables Reduce Inventory Requirements Available in White or Black
Download/View Brochure White Keyboard Wedge White Serial Black Keyboard Wedge Black Serial
Metrologic MS7620 Horizon Suggested Retail: $1,130.00 Our Price: $475.00 View Details
Horizon is an in-counter laser bar code scanner. This compact, hands-free scanner is designed with a dense 20-line omnidirectional scan pattern that helps provide fast, efficient throughput with a high first-pass read rate.
Features Automatic Scanning Operation Decodes All Standard 1D, RSS-14, RSS Limited, and RSS Expanded Bar Codes Durable Die-Cast Construction Firmware Updates via Flash ROM EAS Deactivation Antenna is Standard Custom Edit Barcode Data User-Replaceable, Single Cable Interface to Host RS232 Auxiliary Port for Adding Peripherals Field Replaceable Window
Download/View Brochure
Metrologic MS9535 Voyager Wireless Scanner Suggested Retail: $895.00 Our Price: $495.00 View Details
Wireless Scanning up to 33 Feet Away
Features Cable Free Scanning Using BlueTooth Wireless Standard CodeGate Data Transmission Technology Firmware Updates Via Flash Rom Shipping as Kit; Power Supply,Cable,Manuals and Stand Included
Download/View Brochure Keyboard Wedge Serial
PRINTERS Samsung SRP-275A Receipt Printer Suggested Retail: $295.00 Our Price: $215.00 View Details
The SRP-275A series two-color dot-matrix printer combines high reliability with a low cost of ownership.
Features Very fast dot-matrix printing speed of 4.6 lines per second High quality easy to read print High reliability at 18,000,000 lines MCBF Compatible with competitors emulations including Epson, Star, Citizen Compact design Easy to use Plug&play Auto paper loading for paper replacement Near-end sensor and paper-end sensor
Download/View Brochure Ivory-Serial Ivory-Parallel Gray-Serial Grey Parallel
Citizen iDP-3551 Printer Suggested Retail: $400.00 Our Price: $245.00 View Details
High-speed printers for bankcard, POS, fast food, restaurant and convenience store use.
Features 9 Pin Dot Matrix Printing High Speed Print (Bi-Directional) 2-Color Printing (Black&Red) 3 Emulations in 1 Paper Auto Load and Paper Auto Cutter Built-In Power Supply

Samsung SRP-275C Receipt Printer Suggested Retail: $350.00 Our Price: $265.00 View Details
The SRP-275C series two-color dot-matrix printer combines high reliability with a low cost of ownership.
Features Auto Paper Cutter Very fast dot-matrix printing speed of 4.6 lines per second High quality easy to read print High reliability at 18,000,000 lines MCBF Compatible with competitors emulations including Epson, Star, Citizen Compact design Easy to use Plug&play Auto paper loading for paper replacement Near-end sensor and paper-end sensor

CBM-1000II Thermal Printer Suggested Retail: $600.00 Our Price: $300.00 View Details
Two-Color, High Speed Thermal POS Printer. Includes barcode printing and flash memory for storing logos.
Features Two-Color and Monochrome Thermal Printing High Speed Printing (150mm/sec) Multiple interface options: Serial/Parallel/USB/Ethernet Interface Boards Drop-In Paper Loading Barcode Printing Internal/External Power Supply Configuration Spill Resistant Top 2 Drawer Kick-Out Auto-Cutter and Tear Bar Paper Low/Paper Out Sensors ESC/POS Emulation, OPOS, and Windows Drivers

Epson TM-U200B Printer Suggested Retail: $368.00 Our Price: $325.00 View Details
The TM-U200B printer is in wide use as the POS standard printer for the general retail, restaurant kitchen and hospitality markets.
Features 9 Pin Dot Matrix Printing 2-Color Printing (Black&Red) Flexible, and With a Multitude of Applications Easy Paper Loading with Tear-Bar and Autocutter Ease-of-use features including Auto Status Back (ASB) messages

Samsung SRP-370 Receipt Printer Suggested Retail: $450.00 Our Price: $345.00 View Details
With speed, quality and value, the Samsung SRP-370 thermal receipt printer is clearly first in it?s class.
Features Fast 150mm/second (47.2 lps) print speed Multiple interface (standard RS-232C/IEEE-1284, option RS-485/USB) Compatible with competitors emulations including Epson, Star, Citizen Saves installation space (compact size, wall mount option) Easy to use Drop and print paper supply Simple to eliminate paper jam Compact design Auto cutter Near-end sensor and paper-end sensor

Epson TM-T88III Receipt Printer Suggested Retail: $457.00 Our Price: $425.00 View Details
Epsons TM-T88III thermal printer has all the benefits of the best-selling TM-T88II with faster printing.
Features Thermal Printing Technology Fast print speed, up to 5.9/sec. 25% faster than the TM-T88II Easy Drop-In Paper Loading with Tear-Bar and Autocutter Ease-of-use features including Auto Status Back (ASB) messages
